set_auto_delay_off_scene.description: Turns the light on to the specified brightness and sets a timer to turn it back off after the given number of minutes. If the light is off, Set a colour scene, if light is off, it will be turned on.

set_color_flow_scene.description: Starts a colour flow. If the light is off, it will be turned on.

set_color_scene.description: Changes the light to the specified RGB colour and brightness. If the light is off, it will be turned on.

rgb_color.description: Colour for the light in RGB-format.
rgb_color.name: RGB colour

set_color_scene.name: Set colour scene

set_color_temp_scene.description: Changes the light to the specified colour temperature. If the light is off, it will be turned on.

kelvin.description: Colour temperature for the light in Kelvin.
kelvin.name: Kelvin

set_color_temp_scene.name: Set colour temperature scene

hs_color.description: Colour for the light in hue/sat format. Hue is 0-359 and Sat is 0-100.
